Home

Hello World. As the banner says above I am Devon Ring, born in the depths of southern Ontario.
Employed at the Bank of Canada in Ottawa as a contract employee working on a massive Windows 7 Deployment project.
I am enrolled at Carleton University for my final year into my undergrad in Computer Science: Internet & Network security.
Currently I have been spending the majority of my spare time working on a small website ( no where near ready, who knew interface design would be so demanding :P ) My current projects can be found at my GitHub page: here
